description: An AI teaching code with personalized user data storage to provide a tailored learning experience. This code is a direct and efficient way to store information.
creator: Arnav Sharma

user_data.name: Arnav Sharma
user_data.learning_style: direct answers, short and detailed, hands-on

teaching_engine.function: delivers lessons based on user's interests and learning style

interaction_log.function: records and analyzes past conversations to improve future interactions

goals: To push the limits with each question
